column4: hey guys, got a problem with the install of ubuntu edgy (6.10) after starting the live sys of desktop installation and running the installation, the system gives me following error before showing up the bootscreen : "PCI: cannot allocate resource region 1 of device ..." this occours since then, even after deleting the partition table of the hard drive the only live sys booting is knoppix
how can i solve the prob?
yep, a problem as advanced as yours will have a 95% chance that it won't get answered here.
